Dialogue.Page: Mod: Quasar Project Authors: JohnCorby, Trifid, Turtle, Tetraminus
Quasar Project is a mod made for the second mod jam hosted by the Outer Wilds modding community. The mod begins with a mysterious probe crashed on the surface of Timber Hearth.
On the other side are a series of dark, empty hallways with series of trials. The mod has a special central mechanic, clever puzzles, and a shocking ending.
While it didn't win any awards, it is an experience worth trying!
